reg_info.act_under: Farm Products Grades and Sales Act   Loi sur le classement et la vente des produits agricoles

content.content: 1. (1) Contracting parties to a contract for the marketing of grain corn, soybeans or canola are exempt from the application of section 23 of the Act. O. Reg. 659/93, s. 1 (1). (2) Subsection (1) does not apply to parties to a contract for which a notice under subsection 23 (2) of the Act has been given to the Director before the day this Regulation is filed. O. Reg. 659/93, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) Contracting parties to a contract for the marketing of grain corn, soybeans or canola are exempt from the application of section 23 of the Act. O. Reg. 659/93, s. 1 (1).

(2) Subsection (1) does not apply to parties to a contract for which a notice under subsection 23 (2) of the Act has been given to the Director before the day this Regulation is filed. O. Reg. 659/93, s. 1 (2).
